name: awesome-toast-component
description: React, Angular, Vue, and Typescript compatible toast.
author: Mostafa Mohammadzadeh

scripts.dep: npm update && npm publish && cd website && npm update && npm run build && npm run export && cd .. && find website/out -type d -exec chmod 755 {} \; && find website/out -type f -exec chmod 644 {} \; && git add -A && git commit -m "[deployment auto commit]" && git ftp push
